monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Unique Aura: Bleed stacks on enemies are not removed when they take Bleed damage.

skills.name: Air Sickle
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Assistance
skills.description: Every heal that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 10% chance to apply Sidekick (Buff).

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Bite
skills.description: 2 x 170% (340%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 2 x (50 + 40% Attack)

skills.name: Bite Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 3 x (50 + 30% Attack)

skills.name: Bite Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 125% (500%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 4 x (75 + 25% Attack)

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Bleed Out
skills.description: Unique Aura: Bleed stacks on enemies are not removed when they take Bleed damage.

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Carnage
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (500 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Charging Shield
skills.description: Shield self for 60 when receiving a Charge stack.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Buffs
skills.description: When applying a Buff, there is a chance to also apply 2 Charge stacks, equal to this Monster's Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Deep Wounds
skills.description: Aura: Bleed damage on enemies is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dodging
skills.description: Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 8%.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Feast
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Bleed damage, heal all Monsters in the party by 15% of that amount.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Full Utility
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick, Glory & Barrier (Buffs)

skills.name: Giantsbane
skills.description: This Monster deals 5% more damage. Against enemies with a Health rating of 7 or higher, damage is increased by 20% instead.

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Mythic
skills.description: Applies Glory, Channel & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Shroud
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Shroud Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Shroud Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Spellshield & Agility (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Spellshield
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Typhoon Cut
skills.description: 6 x 90% (540%) physical damage (wind) applies Glory, Sidekick & Agility (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Wind Affinity
skills.description: Wind attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
